Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory125.png'}
{3: 'A solitary steel bridge spans across the sand-swept wasteland.'}
{2: 'Is this the place?', 3: '5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Yes. According to the survey results, the source of the interference should be somewhere nearby.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Before her words are finished, Liv suddenly pauses as if sensing something.'}
{3: 'You all stop in your tracks simultaneously right as you are about to step onto the bridge.'}
{2: "What's wrong, Liv?", 3: '13'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I'm detecting a new signal approaching you... It's moving extremely fast!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "It's very close!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiTransfiniteMain/FxUiTransfiniteGlow.prefab', 2: '3'}

{1: '1', 3: 'Yellow sand churns as a gust of wind cuts through the thick dust. Accompanied by the sound of rushing air, a slender figure descends from above, landing gracefully in front of the bridge.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiAreaWarHangUp/FxUiAreaWarHangUpBg01.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1'}
{3: 'You all immediately enter a defensive stance, your blades unsheathed and your guns loaded, ready to strike.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiTransfiniteMain/FxUiTransfiniteGlow.prefab'}
{1: '1', 3: 'However, as the dust gradually settles to reveal an elegant silhouette, all of you freeze in surprise.'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Commandant... and Lucia and Lee from Gray Raven?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiAreaWarHangUp/FxUiAreaWarHangUpBg01.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The unexpected encounter momentarily stuns everyone. After putting away your weapons and exchanging brief greetings, you explain the purpose of your mission to Hanying.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Investigating this facility? It seems our objectives are quite similar.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'I was sent by Zavier to investigate the situation here.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Zavier...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: '1', 3: 'You remember him as the optimistic awakened machine from the Church of Machina...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory125.png'}
{2: 'Did he build this place?', 3: '59'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "He didn't.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'He discovered this experimental base years ago. Fascinated, he managed to "hide" it away, planning to look into it at his leisure someday.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'However, he became increasingly busy with other matters as time passed, and this place was eventually forgotten.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Recently, the cloaking device malfunctioned, which reminded him of this place. As I happened to be passing by, he asked me to investigate.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'But I didn\'t expect to be affected by the cognitive interference and fall into the "illusion" as soon as I entered... It\'s rather embarrassing.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Our experiences are quite similar, then.', 3: '66'}
{2: 'We found some clues about escaping this illusion along the way.', 3: '67'}
{2: 'But you must have also detected the "interference source" nearby if you headed straight here.', 3: '68'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Zavier mentioned several possibilities to me regarding the interference source.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'However, I still need to verify some key details before I can confirm which type of interference is at work.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'If possible, I hope I can ask you and Gray Raven to lend me a hand, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sure you can.', 3: '74'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Thank you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "Now, we'll need to collect some crucial data in this area.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "We might come into contact with enemies within the illusion during so. I'll be counting on you all when that happens.", 4: '1'}
